"Option was changed, it is effective when restarted"
You are not connected to a device
"Do you agree to Judge of Checkmate by \"%1$s\"\n" "(This dialog is disabled by \"Board Options\")."
Suspend the game? (Game will be saved)
Partner requested suspend the game,\n Do you agree? (the game will be saved)
Suspend completed, but requester failed to save game.
Conversation is available after IP or Bluetooth connection established
Start game after selecting mode by \"Play\".
Board was closed, Close Panel by \"Close\" then start new Game.
Now IP connection is alive,\nRetry after disconnected the IP connection.
Now Bluetooth connection is alive,\nRetry after disconnected the BT connection.
No new device found, did you make discoverable on partners\' device
Could not Accept(%1$s), try App restart after reset(Off/On) bluetooth on Android Settings.
Bluetooth was now enable, retry the request.
Failed to find my AP-Address,\n close this dialog then check Wi-Fi status.
"IP connection failed to %1$s (port:%2$d)\n" "Confirm \"Open Port\" on the other hand.\n"
Connection failed, Confirm target device is in "Waiting Connection Request" state.
Show Timer also when no Timeout
Invalid data(No Initial Pieces),\nconfirm contents and \"Format\".
two pawn on the same file
Foul:two pawn on the same file
Data receive failed for Restart Game request.
Data send failed for Restart game request.
Rejected game request by the reason of Board busy.\n Close board pending close if exist.
Touch effective on ReplayBoard only when Variation mode.
The file is not for Free Board.
The file is for Free Board.
Failed to analize the record of %1$s.
"Unhandled Exception.\nCrash Report will be sent to author."
This is not of interrupted game.
This device will act as a client.
Servier IP was gotten, hit \"OK\",\nthen \"Connect\" to server after confirmed server-side \"Open Port\".
Hit \"OK\", then \"Open Port\" to accept connection as server.
Severe! Channel is probably lost permanently.\nTry after Enable Wi-Fi Direct(See \"Help\").
Pairing abort request failed. Reason Code:
Wi-Fi Direct pairing is not established yet.

"When both devices are showing this panel,
" " contact two device's "NFC" sensor in a 10 cm(3.9 in) or less.
" "Then touch screen on a device
" " when "Touch to Beam" was shown.

Opened NFC dialog unmatch of Wifi-Direct and Blueetooth.
Not valid panel to process NFC contact
No peer devices found for NFC"
"Already paired with No session,\n \"OpenPort\"/\"Connect\" to continue, \"Unpair\" for new pairing."
"Already in session,\nClick \"Game\" from one of two. \nOR \"Unpair\" for new pairing."
Game not started.(engotiation not yet completed)
This device will act as server(ConnectionAccepter).
"Only one session can be active simultaneously.\n" "To create new session, disconnect currently active session(%1$s)."
Now active session exists.\nIt will be disconnected when excute \"Uppair\".\nDo you execute \"Unpair\"?

"Select Connection-type then,push OK.

" " Bluetooth-Secure option requirs the status

" " )"

"When both devices are showing this panel,
" " contact two device's "NFC" sensor in a 10 cm(3.9 in) or less.
" "Then touch screen on a device
" " when "Touch to Beam" was shown.
"

"There is a connection with the above device.
" "If OK, start "Game",
" "else if you want to connect to another device,
" ""Disconnect", then retry from "NFC" button."
"Now listening another device's connect request.\n" "Once \"Stop Accept\", \"Cancel\" dialog,\n" "the reopen this dilaog."

"Warinin:Bluetooth secure level unmatch.
" "Partner requested %1$s, you selected %2$s.
" "Connected accepting partners option.
" "Cancel Game Request if you do not agree.
" "And also disconnect session from "NFC" button if you want."
Ignored new NFC msg(this device already paired)
NFC connection is OK but Wi-Fi connection is NG.\nCheck wireless environment.
Bluetooth was turned to OFF.\nRestart this application.
You have to UnPair from \"Settings\" to delete Paired Device from list.

"This device is not visible(not discoverable).

\"Use book\" option may take noticeably longer start up time for large size book.\nAlive message will issued each 15 seconds if healthy.
Use Book checkbox conflict with option parameter \"--nobook\".
={0} sent a response in an unexpected format ({1}).
